title: Houses in history
creator_credit: Seven-League Unit, Paul Rotha and H.M. Nieter
brief_description: The different kinds of material used for building in the British Isles and their influence on construction are studied, with a brief survey of the development of houses in England from the 13th century until today.
creator_credit_for_label: Seven-League Unit, Paul Rotha and H.M. Nieter
